segments.text: Would you like to have some icecream ? I've got a variety of flavors for you to choose from . I've got strawberry , peach , chocolate , coffee , vanilla and praline .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! So many choices you have ! I wish I could , but I just can't . I'm on a diet to lose weight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , just a bite . It doesn't really hurt to have just a bite .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd better not . Please don't tempt me . Please !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're damn right . I'm not so easily coaxed into doing something that I think is wrong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'd better not tempt you . Otherwise , if I give you a piece of cake , you might ask for a glass of milk .
segments.speaker: S1
